item.title: Some photos from my holiday in Japan
item.description:
In november I got to go to the land of the rising sun! Here are some photos from the trip

We start in Tokyo

Pretty cool

When we were in tokyo we took a day and went to mt takao. Here’s what it looked like

I also found schlatt’s monkey there

Osaka was the next city we visited. Only got 2 photos of it though :(

Kagoshima was probably the highlight of the trip so there are a bunch of photos for this city. This is also the point where I realised I could take 16:9 photos instead of 4:3

item.title: Yet another website redesign!
item.description:
The last site lasted only a couple of months…

Hopefully this one will last longer. This time around I used hugo to build the site. It is a really good tool once you figure it out cause after it’s fully set up, instead of writing HTML, you will be writing all your webpages in Markdown and have the HTML be auto generated by hugo.

The theme I used as a base was Hugo-classic. I left most of it the same, just changing the colors and some parts of the header and footer. The colour scheme that the site uses is called horizon. It is the best colour scheme.
